person_data.name: DR. MIGUEL FÉLIX
person_data.resume: Hi, I'm Miguel Felix Mata Rivera, Professor in Computer Science, GIS, Telematics, IoT, Big Data and Cloud Computing.I hold a Ph.D. in Computer Science. Member of the National Research System (SNI, Mexico). I am a professor in SEPI-UPIITA in the MSc and PhD program in the research line of Telematics systems. I am part of Research Network Computing of IPN, and i am founder-president of ANTACOM association and I have a collaboration as a scientific advisor with GeoIT.

person_data.name: M. EN C. CARLOS
person_data.resume:
Mi nombre es Carlos Hernández Nava, profesor de la UPIITA del IPN adscrito a la academia de telemática.
Creé este sitio con la intención de dar a conocer mis intereses de investigación y para apoyo a los unidades 
de aprendizaje que desarrollo en la UPIITA.
